title: Don't Worry Darling
snippet: A 1950’s housewife living with her husband in a utopian experimental community begins to worry that his glamorous company may be hiding disturbing secrets. Harry stars as Jack, the husband.
content: A 1950’s housewife living with her husband in a utopian experimental community begins to worry that his glamorous company may be hiding disturbing secrets. Harry stars as Jack, the husband.

title: My Policeman
snippet: Set in the 1950s in Brighton, a gay policeman named Tom marries a school teacher named Marion while being in a relationship with Patrick, a museum curator. The secret they share threatens to ruin them all. Harry plays as Tom
content: Set in the 1950s in Brighton, a gay policeman named Tom marries a school teacher named Marion while being in a relationship with Patrick, a museum curator. The secret they share threatens to ruin them all. Harry plays as Tom

title: Love On Tour
snippet: Love On Tour is the second concert tour by English singer-songwriter Harry Styles, in support of his second studio album, Fine Line. Touring from Sept 4, 2021 – Dec 10, 2022.
content: Love On Tour is the second concert tour by English singer-songwriter Harry Styles, in support of his second studio album, Fine Line. Touring from Sept 4, 2021 – Dec 10, 2022.

title: Pleasing
snippet: Harry Styles has unveiled his new beauty brand, Pleasing. The brand’s mission is to ‘bring joyful experiences and products… and dispel the myth of a binary existence‘, and launches with a handful of products including serums and nail polish.
content: Harry Styles has unveiled his new beauty brand, Pleasing. The brand’s mission is to ‘bring joyful experiences and products… and dispel the myth of a binary existence‘, and launches with a handful of products including serums and nail polish.
